text: Area code 530 is a telephone area code in the state of California, United States. It was created on November 1, 1997, when it was split from area code 916. It covers the northeastern and northern parts of California. Some of the major cities and towns in this area code include Redding, Chico, Davis, Grass Valley, South Lake Tahoe, and Yuba City. == Related pages == * 530
title: Area code 530
